items.title: High-Speed Chase Video Adds to Controversy About Cuyahoga County Deputy
items.description: Deputy Isen Vajusi’s actions raise more questions about how the Downtown Safety Patrol polices Cleveland’s streets without much oversight.

items.title: A Woman With HIV Spent Six Years in Solitary. She Sued and Missouri Will Change Its Policy.
items.description: Honesty Bishop was attacked by her cellmate. Prison officials deemed her sexually active and kept her in isolation for more than 2,000 days.

items.description: The criminal justice journalism outlet shines in hard news and podcast categories.
